file_content.text: This choke point has been stabilized, thanks to you. Ulgo won't be getting through here anytime soon.
I--it's a miracle... the Ulgo forces are retreating. You... you did it.
Too bad, I was just getting warmed up.
I'm still fresh.
If that was a warm-up, I'd hate to see the main attraction.
I couldn't have done it without you, Lieutenant.
You were a great help.
You are too... too kind, Sith.
Come back for more, you cowards!
Wimps.
Please, please, just let them go.
I'll get General Gesselle on the holo for you. She'll be very relieved.
What's the word, Dargus? I assume that since you're hailing me, the day is won?
Yes, General. The Sith singlehandedly turned back the entire attack!
Sith, as painful as it has been, it seems you've come through. I hope you're not expecting a thank you.
You're welcome, General.
Not from you.
Any excuse to slaughter, I suppose.
War makes strange bedfellows.
This was an uneasy alliance.
This experience has certainly proven that.
I want what you promised.
Just keep your end of the deal.
Yes, well, a deal is a deal.
Now, I promised to tell you where Jaesa Willsaam's parents could be found. They have been servants in Castle Organa for many years.
Sith, the Willsaams are simple, innocent, hardworking people. They deserve your mercy.
You assume I have mercy to give.
Not really in my nature.
Perhaps.
That's all I can ask.
They deserve whatever I give them.
I decide if they die.
I'll leave it at that.
Uh, goodbye, Sith. And... thanks for saving my life.
Th--there's blood all over me! It's everywhere! Everywhere!
Calm down, Lieutenant, your wounds are superficial.
You're alright.
You--you're right. I'm... alright. But that may not be the case soon.
That's just how I like it!
Isn't it great?
I--it seems you're about to be even more pleased, then.
Thank you for the update, now shut up.
Quiet.
My lord, Ulgo reinforcements are approaching. It sounds like an entire battalion. I believe the worst is yet to come.
Hey, I just snuck a peek into the tunnel. There's a heap of those laser brains getting ready for another swipe.
T--there's a good chance I'll shut up for good soon.
I think there are more on their way. Much, much more!
Let's stay sharp.
Ready yourself.
Some people are gluttons for punishment.
They never learn.
Bring the whole blasted army! I'll take them all!
The more the merrier!
Get ready to be overrun!
That was... that was amazing. They just kept coming and coming, and you... you're a war machine.
I appreciate your observation.
Thank you.
That was nothing.
What's amazing is that you survived.
You're still alive?
My lord, the enemy is still in the tunnel regrouping for another attack. We must be ready.
Uh, you might want to stop all the chatter. Those bozos are regrouping for another attack. Get ready.
They're still in there, regrouping. Prepping for another attack. Be ready.
Let them come. They'll find I'm more than their match.
I'm always ready.
Shut up and let me concentrate.
Pipe down.
Wake me when they get here.
I'm not concerned.
Here they come!
I'll try to overcome the fear and support you the best I can.
All right, men, this is it. With the captain d--dead, it falls on m--me to rally what's left of us.
I--I guess the reinforcements aren't gonna make it. We better get ready. Ulgo forces are fast approaching. I can feel the tunnel walls sh--shaking.
Consider me your reinforcements. I'm here to help.
Don't worry.
That's your knees knocking together, coward.
What a wimp.
Then we shake the walls right back at them!
You need some fighting spirit!
Lieutenant, we've been flanked!
No, wait! General Gesselle sent word that a Sith would be coming to our aid, but I thought I must have misheard her.
Sir, I'm not trusting a Sith. No way.
We're drastically outnumbered, Sergeant. The general's given an order and besides, without help, we die for sure.
The rest of the men and me aren't sticking around for a suicide run.
If you men follow the sergeant, you'll miss a great victory.
It's going to be glorious.
If we stay, either Ulgo kills us or the Sith does. Who's leaving with me?
Uh, I don't think so, Sarge. Maybe with the Sith at our side we can repel the attack.
You'd only get in the way anyway.
Go, then. I don't need you.
Follow me, men. Only a fool fights where there's no chance of victory.
I'll see to it none of you makes it to the door.
Try it and die.
Ulgo's coming, men. The Sith won't have time to fight us. I say we go. Come on!
Uh, Sarge, I don't think so. The Sith could probably waste us all without batting an eyelash.
Yeah, and I don't relish the idea of being a deserter anyway.
Glad to hear it, men. Sergeant, you are relieved. And I will report this to General Gesselle personally.
Now you're sounding like a leader, Lieutenant.
Well done.
Even though I understand the instinct to run, desertion can't be tolerated.
Just kill him, Dargus.
You should execute him.
I won't take an Organa life. It's not our way. But he will be punished and he'll have to live with the shame.
Get out of here, Sergeant. Let the real soldiers fight the good fight.
That won't be necessary.
He dies. [Kill sergeant]
You see, I told you, don't trust the Sith...!
Lieutenant, the Ulgo forces are coming now! What do we do?
Stand your ground and fight like men!
Defend the front!
Stay out of my way and watch.
Stand aside.
Most of you aren't going to make it.
You probably die.
Take your positions! This is it!
We're with you, Sarge.
Lieutenant, you coming? We've bled enough for this war.
No, Sergeant. I--I want to live, but I won't leave my post. Go if you must.
At least there's one brave soldier among you.
You are a man among boys.
Get out of here, deserters.
Leave now.
I won't need their help anyway.
No loss if they leave.
Suit yourself. Die with the Sith for all we care.
I can't believe they're all leaving. What chance of survival is there now?
They're cowards. They'd just get in the way.
We don't need them.
I'll survive. You, I'm not so sure of.
You should be nervous.
Well, i--if I'm going to die, at least it will be with honor.
Stay back, Lieutenant. I'll keep you alive.
Don't worry.
I'll try to overcome the fear and support you the best I can.
I hear them coming. This is it!
But I can't send a lethal killing machine like you into my people's citadel. So, I'm having the Willsaams brought to me. You can pick them up here.
That's perfect.
Good.
Storming Castle Organa would have been a thrill.
Where's the fun in that?
Your fun would've caused too much misery.
Don't double-cross me. This better not be a trick.
They better be there.
They are already on their way.
Do us both a favor and activate the transponder I gave you so my men know not to impede your progress here. Gesselle out.
